error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Config\Entity\ConfigEntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Please use toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Config\Entity\ConfigEntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Please use toUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to address_formatter.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
